hook.text: Globalization made iPhones cheap and jobs scarce. Anti-globalists say the deal wasn't worth it.

buildup.text: Anti-globalism opposes free trade, open borders, and international institutions that override national sovereignty.

discovery.text: Brexit was anti-globalism in action. Voters chose national control over EU membership and free movement.

twist.text: Anti-globalism unites strange allies. Left-wing labor activists and right-wing nationalists both oppose free trade.

climax.text: The pandemic showed both sides: global supply chains failed, but global vaccine cooperation saved millions.

punchline.text: Globalization creates winners and losers. Anti-globalists speak for the losers.

quiz.question: Why is Brexit considered an example of anti-globalism?
options: Voters chose national sovereignty over EU membership and free movement
The EU forced Britain to leave
